items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-based system to provide personalized product recommendations to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 personalized product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions such as clicks and purchases.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to non-personalized suggestions.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data
non_functional: Recommendations must load within 500ms after page load
System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users without performance degradation
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed that the platform already has user accounts, product catalog, and tracking mechanisms in place. Further clarification needed on the specific AI algorithms and data sources to be used.
